overview: Four girls high school expelled because of Tryphon, the seducer of the school. The Trifonas flirt with many girls and when they decide to throw rotten vegetables, manage to throw in not Tryphon but in high school gymnast. All high school begins a fight to help. They are trying to postpone the council of teachers and to convince Lykeiarchi suspend the expulsion. When all these fail the students resort to eikoniki..aftoktonia.
title: High School with Crazy
